constantValues: Shows whether the article is a draft or is published, archived, or discarded. Draft articles aren't available externally and can be edited. Published articles are available externally, based on applicable permissions, but can't be edited. All metadata changes are reflected in the published version. Archived and discarded articles aren't available externally and can't be edited.
Type a title for the article.
Type keywords to be used for searches in knowledge base articles. Separate keywords by using commas.
